item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are confident about the potential of these 3 stocks
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three stocks, including Uber Technologies and Alphabet, favored by Wall Street.

item.title: These stocks can benefit the most from lower oil prices, says Jefferies
item.description: Stocks belonging to the tech and consumer discretionary sectors could outperform as oil prices stay low, according to Jefferies.

item.title: If Apple makes a foldable phone, analysts say this stock will benefit
item.description: U.S. hedge fund magnate Steve Cohen has also jumped in to buy the stock, according to filings with the Hong Kong stock exchange.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway continues to underperform after Buffett's exit news, now trailing the S&P 500
item.description: The Omaha-based conglomerate's B shares have suffered six negative weeks in the past seven, on track for its third straight negative month.

item.title: Elliott has built a stake in Global Payments. How the activist can help the company lift its share price
item.description: Elliott Investment Management has a stake in Global Payments, and the news comes a few months after the payments processor made a big acquisition.
